podcasts.title: Context is King: Engineering the Brains, and Nightmares, of AI Agents
podcasts.description: The era of simple "prompt engineering" is over. We explore why "context engineering" is the critical discipline for building powerful AI agents and why it's also the source of their greatest dangers.

podcasts.title: Fasten Your Nightmares
podcasts.description: Forget ghosts and ghouls; the real horror is at 30,000 feet, and it's asking for a pen.
